name: Bake Cookies PRO
description:
*Apps On Sale* Get one now while it lasts! Thank You For Playing! Enjoy!
- No ads, no micro transactions, no IAP, no crippled gameplay, no data requirements. Just pure game.
- From an indie game developer who loves Pokemon and you
- Sale price
- Game runs on all iPhones (3GS, 4, 4s, 5, 5s, 5c, 6s, 6, 6 Plus, 6s Plus, SE) running iOS 5.1.1 or higher for wide compatibility
- Game runs on all iPod Touches (3rd gen, 4th gen, 5th gen, 6th gen) running iOS 5.1.1 or higher for wide compatibility
- Game runs on all iPads running iOS 5.1.1 or higher for wide compatibility
- Enjoy


You have 5 seconds to produce cookies. You are a lone cookie in the jar. How will you defend yourself against the onslaught?! Are you up to the challenge? How many cookies can you obtain? Let's find out!



Beat the timer!
Beat the scores of your friends!
